unit.title: Output Spatial unit
unit.description: Number of the spatial unit that we want to generate an output for. This could be the spatial unit for a river section, HRU, or LSU as defined by the Tordera watershed delineation in (link to the watershed map)

file.title: SWAT Output File
file.description:
SWAT Output File to use. Example: 'channel_sd_day'. For possible values, please check the SWAT documentation (TODO Amanda where exactly?).
Note: You can look into print.prt, take any of the variables there and append '_day' or '_month', or '_year'. TODO Amanda please check.

variable.title: SWAT Variable
variable.description: Variable to simulate. Example: 'flo_out'. For possible values, please check the SWAT documentation (TODO Amanda where exactly?)

start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: Start date of the simulation in the format yyyymmdd. Defaults to: 20160101. Earliest possible date: (TODO).

start_date_print.title: Start date
start_date_print.description: Start date for printing in the format yyyymmdd. Defaults to: 20190601. Earliest possible date: (TODO).

end_date.title: End date
end_date.description: End date of the simulation in the format yyyymmdd. Defaults to: 20201231. Latest possible date: (TODO).

swat_output_file.title: Some output param Amanda
swat_output_file.description: The result as a SWAT output file.

parameter_calibration.title: Parameter Calibration
parameter_calibration.description: SWAT Parameter calibration used by the simulation, calibrated by Amanda Batlle, CREAF, Barcelona, Spain (TODO - AManda what needs to be here?).
